actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on  Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that veterans' pension and compensation will not be reduced as a result of cost of living increases in social security benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that veterans' pension and compensation will not be reduced as a result of increases in monthly social security benefits resulting from the enactment of Public Law 93-66 or any subsequent cost-of-living adjustment under title II of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that veterans' pension and compensation will not be reduced as a result of cost of living increases in social security benefits.
